entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
